name: Game of Red Buttons
description:
The most realistic nuclear war simulator ever.

Play it in fullscreen mode, for better experience.

How to play: 

 1. Remember: bigger buttons always work better.
2. Touching button makes it smaller. 
 3. Doomsday devices may fire back automatically and turn victory into defeat  
4. When playing against friend on the same PC, you may use keyboard.
SPACE for Player 1 and ENTER for Player 2.

Tip: Mouse still works in two player mode, so, try to grab it first!  Fighting for mouse adds additional fun to the game.
